item.title: Lesson Learned: Tax Details Importation
item.description:
A client recently inquired about manually setting up numerous tax details in Dynamics GP during a testing phase. Since this involved both a live and a test database, manual setup would be doubly time-consuming. Opting for a supposedly “quick” table import, a mistake was made. While table imports themselves are not problematic, the assumption of speed was. Importing to the Sales/Purchases Tax Master (TX00201) table requires careful attention. Manually setting up a record beforehand is crucial to understand the appropriate settings for all fields, many of which have specific default values needed for the import...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/lesson-learned-tax-details-importation/
